short_summary: Procurement of one (1) new cultivator/chisel plow unit
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by August 22nd, 2023 at 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s (AAFC) Swift Current Research and Development Centre (SCRDC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) new Cultivator/Chisel Plow unit.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Reference: WS4068767397, Amendment 2, Document 4071681266

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) announces that the [Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada](https://www.agr.gc.ca) Swift Current Research and Development Centre (SCRDC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) new Cultivator/Chisel Plow unit.

#### Tender Details
- **Tender ID:** 57781254 (WS4068767397)
- **Tender Status:** Cancelled as per Amendment 2 (Document 4071681266)
- **Publication Date:** 14 Jul 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** CANCELED 

#### Contract Summary
The department's expected contract start date is 18 Aug 2023 and end date is 18 Aug 2024.

#### Procurement Method
This tender follows a Competitive – Open Bidding process.

#### Goods and Services
The Works consist of the supply and delivery of one (1) new Cultivator/Chisel Plow unit.

#### Quantity
One (1) unit.

#### Location
Swift Current, Canada.

#### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### IA/EO Tender EStyleSheet  emails: Jim.Stoesz@tpsgc-pwgsc.ac.ca

## Clauses, Documents, and RFP documentation
Please refer to the original tender documents for more information.
